title: A COOL Rotation Game Mode!!!
body: Hey! What if there is a game mode that team of five players is playing against a level 18 100,000 gold player in summoners rift? Will that be cool?{{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} (I can already see a level 18 Draven fully build cutting people down Lmao)

replies.body: This is called nemesis draft when someone is bad and gives malphite.
